title: Software Engineer
details: Development work on the Soundtrap product, which is a web based DAW and podcast creation app.

title: Developer
details: I rewrote an internet bank, co-created/maintained a react component library and developed various micro services in java.

title: Developer
details: I designed and developed numerous products such as Park46, a garage managing app, as well as Laddkoll and an administrative tool for garage owners.

title: Freelance Developer
details: Collaborated with Sebton/Co to develop a web presence for SHHBostad. I also took on web development work for various smaller clients.

title: Frontend Developer
details: Development work for Swish, one of Swedens largest payment providers, as well as interface prototyping for a major asian electronics company and conceptual work for Elkjøp.

title: Frontend Developer
details: Various ad-related work for clients such as Nike, Mabi and Machinegames. Developed the PS4 companion app for Wolfenstein: The New Order.
